name: Jon Grythe Stødle
briefIntro: Developer · UX Enthusiast · Lover of Pure Functions
fullBio:
Jon has been developing software for over 8 years and is currently producing code for a company located in the small Norwegian city of Grimstad.

In his spare time he's a Pluralsight author, Dungeon Master and likes long sessions in front of the computer.

His exploits can be read either on his blog ([https://blog.jonstodle.com](https://blog.jonstodle.com)) or on Twitter ([@jonstodle](https://twitter.com/jonstodle)).
